chemaxon.checkers

Class BondChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • chemaxon.checkers.AbstractStructureChecker
      • chemaxon.checkers.ComponentChecker<MolBond>
        • chemaxon.checkers.BondChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StructureChecker, chemaxon.license.Licensable, PropertyChangeListener, Cloneable, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrossedDoubleBondChecker, OverlappingBondsChecker, QueryBondChecker, ReactingCenterBondMarkChecker, StraightDoubleBondChecker

    public abstract class BondChecker
extends ComponentChecker<MolBond>
    Descentants of the abstract BondChecker class detect bond related problems.
    Since:
    Marvin 5.3
    Version:
    5.7
    Author:
    Attila Szabo
